Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets.

Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4347205,"totalDownVotes":588197,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak üëÄ","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":30594,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"üëÄ

--- 25% more gold!"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":263894,"totalDownVotes":139690,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":25066,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":9277770,"creatorName":"Anime Legend Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":92213,"totalDownVotes":7531,"universeId":2317140681,"name":"[JOJO UPDATE] Anime Mania","placeId":6284881984,"playerCount":14521,"imageToken":"T_6284881984_34ef","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"This is Anime Mania. Upon joining the game, it is suggested that you spend some of the gems that you have rolling on a few characters. Then you should equip 3 of these characters in order to make your team. After making your team, you can play the game by starting a room and you can either invite your friends or play alone. Obtain more characters, win the arenas, and upgrade your characters! 

PC Controls:
Left Click: Basic Attack
Right Click: Heavy Attack
1,2,3,4- Character Skills
Jump + Left Click: Up Combo
Left Click In air: Air finish or simply use a move.

Inspired by Ani-Blox Legends, and All Star Tower Defense.

Owners: 123imnotm0mo and Yakrus
Developers: jacobman737, Lazarovip2,F33NY
Contributors: Swingset68, Arricku,Elikage,LightTheProtagonist, Rinanori"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1183678,"totalDownVotes":67630,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":16215,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":409640380,"creatorName":"MUCDICH","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":144424,"totalDownVotes":16071,"universeId":2294168059,"name":"The Mimic ","placeId":6243699076,"playerCount":12216,"imageToken":"T_6243699076_ec39","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Chapter 3 is finally here! 

CONTROLS:
Shift to Run for PC
L2 to Sprint for XBOX

ABOUT:  You go back to your old high school in hopes of finding your missing group of friends, however, you encounter a mysterious entity that lurks within your school. Eventually, you venture into the unknown depths of a mysterious world.


WARNING: This game contains Flashing lights, Loud Noises & Jumpscares!


Join the group for updates and your support:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/9482918/CTStudio#!/about
